plot: A celebration of the bucolic landscape of Sri Lanka and the rustic beauty of the diesel trains that wind their way through its mountains. Also, a personal and cathartic film about loss, solitude, and the inherent transience of experience.
title: Lanka: Time Loss in Refrain
plot_es: A celebration of the bucolic landscape of Sri Lanka and the rustic beauty of the diesel trains that wind their way through its mountains. Also, a personal and cathartic film about loss, solitude, and the inherent transience of experience.
